entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie in the evening. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
